title: Sync iTunes and System Volume (no key repeat)

rules.description: Sync iTunes and System Volume (on volume key events)

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'if application "iTunes" is running then' -e 'tell application "Music" to try' -e 'set the sound volume to output volume of (get volume settings)' -e 'on error' -e 'set the sound volume to sound volume + 6.5' -e 'end try' -e 'end if'

osascript -e 'if application "Music" is running then' -e 'tell application "Music" to try' -e 'set the sound volume to output volume of (get volume settings)' -e 'on error' -e 'set the sound volume to sound volume - 6.5' -e 'end try' -e 'end if'

rules.description: Sync iTunes and System Volume (on volume key events, allow offset)

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'if application "iTunes" is running then' -e 'tell application "Music" to set the sound volume to sound volume + 6.5' -e 'end if'
osascript -e 'if application "iTunes" is running then' -e 'tell application "Music" to set the sound volume to sound volume - 6.5' -e 'end if'
